13f97273-c2cb-4b58-b7c7-ae680a6845b3.description: This six-course program provides a comprehensive foundation for the use of cannabis and hemp for health and wellness. Each course covers a different practical use of cannabis and hemp, including cannabis basics, an overview of the endocannabinoid system, therapeutic uses, safety, and methods of administration.
13f97273-c2cb-4b58-b7c7-ae680a6845b3.name: Integrative Cannabis Specialist™ (ICS)

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the Integrative Cannabis Specialist (ICS)™ credential have developed a foundation in cannabis basics. Each course will take approximately one hour to complete and includes a video lecture, PDF slides, resources, and online assessment.

11adbf6f-057b-4129-aabd-798bf9b29c6a.description: Homeopathy involves supporting wellness with minute doses of remedies, which, when taken in larger doses by healthy people are capable of producing symptoms similar to the dis-ease it is supporting. It is based on the natural law of healing “Similia Similibus Curantur,” which means “like cures like”. This micro-credential leads students through the theories of homeopathy and the uses for low-dose homeopathic remedies available in most health food stores today. Includes 135 hours of training.
11adbf6f-057b-4129-aabd-798bf9b29c6a.name: Integrative Homeopathy Specialist™

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Integrative Homeopathy Specialist™

3aeae34b-67f6-497d-a7d5-772ccd12452b.description: This micro-credential leads students through the theories of iridology, from historical to modern-day, including the modern controversies and uses in an integrative wellness setting or for personal health. Iridology is based on the theory that it is possible to assess health and sub-health issues by analyzing changes in the structure, texture, and color of the iris and pupil of the eye.
3aeae34b-67f6-497d-a7d5-772ccd12452b.name: Integrative Iridology Specialist™

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Integrative Iridology Specialist™

b8acc27e-c2c5-4efa-8e43-a24df6198e0a.description: This micro-credential provides a comprehensive foundation in the research and protocols for using psychedelic psilocybin mushrooms to support health and wellness. Earners study the basics of psychedelic mushrooms, an overview of the default mode network, therapeutic uses, micro-dosing, safety and contraindications, and the role and best practice of trip sitting. For educational purposes only; note psilocybin is illegal in most states, with legislation forthcoming in states such as Oregon.
b8acc27e-c2c5-4efa-8e43-a24df6198e0a.name: Integrative Psilocybin Mushroom Specialist™ (IPMS)

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the Integrative Psilocybin Mushroom Specialist™ (IPMS) credential have developed foundational knowledge in the use of psilocybin to support health and wellness. Topics include mushroom basics, an overview of the default mode network, therapeutic uses, micro-dosing, safety and contraindications, and the role and best practice of trip sitting.

94541119-8fd8-4cad-9306-5e0ae9257c8a.description: Earners of this badge have have studied all aspects of working with dietary supplements including micro and macronutrients; nutraceuticals including herbs, homeopathy, and medicinal mushrooms; anatomy and physiology related to the absorption and metabolism of dietary supplements; legal considerations for the use of dietary supplements; and holistic lifestyle modifications that dietary supplements professionals may use in their practice or working with customers in a retail setting.
94541119-8fd8-4cad-9306-5e0ae9257c8a.name: Certified Dietary Supplements Professional Exam Prep Program (CDSP)

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

alignments.name: CDSP Exam
alignments.description: This course prepares individuals for the CDSP Exam through NANP.

badge_template_activities.title: This four-course micro-credential prepares earners to sit the National Association of Nutrition Professionals (NANP) Certified Dietary Supplements Professional exam and earn the CDSP™ credential.

7577ab8f-4d2a-4aeb-ac7e-0503d08faf44.description: Badge earners are able to: Effectively develop learning outcomes, develop and implement assessment plans, calibrate and provide training on use of rubrics, conduct outcomes assessment reporting, and close the loop to demonstrate how data is used to drive programmatic and curriculum updates.
7577ab8f-4d2a-4aeb-ac7e-0503d08faf44.name: Assessment Leadership Achievement

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Assessment Leadership Council (ALC) members are able to demonstrate leadership in the area of assessment across the institution, creating a culture of assessment and using data to inform programmatic and curriculum updates. ALC members advocate for best practices in outcomes assessment across the institution and within the higher education community.

8902cb6d-7fc2-4bba-80f7-70859aa634e3.description: After completion of this course, you will understand the role of the peer tutor, navigating basics, how to develop writing skills, how to find sources and unpack research, and learn about the different ACHS student resources.
8902cb6d-7fc2-4bba-80f7-70859aa634e3.name: Peer Tutor Badge

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Tutoring demonstrates leadership by assisting others to set goals and motivating them to develop their skills and alter behaviors to reach those goals. Tutors also may be called upon to advocate for their students and provide helpful feedback to academic staff.

5815b11a-6ee5-4cec-ae0f-b988bd68de7d.description: Earners of this badge have completed the online ACHS New Faculty Orientation program. Earners have learned about innovations in online teaching at ACHS, ways to support student engagement and persistence, and how to use the institution's retention tools including Dropout Detective. Earners have also demonstrated proficiency in the Canvas Learning Management System including course set up and navigation.
5815b11a-6ee5-4cec-ae0f-b988bd68de7d.name: ACHS New Faculty Orientation

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Learn about student support and engagement for online, post-traditional students.
Introduction to ACHS retention support tools including Dropout Detective for outreach and early intervention.
Learn how to navigate the Canvas LMS and other academic technology including virtual library databases and resources.

skills.name: Assessment Strategies In Online Learning Environments

0fde9e7b-1ae6-4a5e-88af-bdfb3f194300.description: This micro-credential highlights the current body of research demonstrating the potential aromatherapy has as a complementary, integrative support for cancer care. This series provides evidence-based information designed for healthcare students, aromatherapists, healthcare providers, and consumers.
0fde9e7b-1ae6-4a5e-88af-bdfb3f194300.name: Aromatherapy in Cancer Care: Research & Support Protocols

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the Aromatherapy in Cancer Care micro-credential understand evidence-based research on the use of aromatherapy as an integrative support tool for cancer. Earners also have the ability to use and recommend aromatherapy self-care for caregivers. Earners have demonstrated skills required to engage and motivate cancer populations to apply healthy behaviors for health recovery.

skills.name: Skincare Safety During Chemotherapy And Radiation

5f4e8663-2605-4fc6-a937-b36562bb75e7.description: This micro-credential provides training on essential oil safety and methods of administration with a particular focus on topical applications. Earners complete four courses to earn the Certified Aromatherapy Safety Professional (CASP)™ credential and learn how essential oils can cause allergic reactions, the importance of proper storage of essential oils and carrier oils, first aid guidelines for aromatherapy, how to mitigate adverse reactions, and toxicology in aromatherapy.
5f4e8663-2605-4fc6-a937-b36562bb75e7.name: Certified Aromatherapy Safety Professional (CASP)™

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Understand how essential oil quality, value, and safety are related. Recall key essential oil safety and quality topics and describe the five primary guidelines for practicing aromatherapy with caution.

Recall aromatherapy safety precautions with a focus on topical applications. Understand how essential oils can cause allergic reactions, the importance of proper storage of essential oils and carrier oils, and first aid guidelines for aromatherapy adverse reactions.
Understand the basics of aromatherapy toxicology, including types of essential oil constituents, therapeutic actions, essential oil metabolism and elimination, and safety during pregnancy.

Discuss safety topics related to essential oil administration including how to safely select a method of use and guidelines for topical, inhalation, and internal methods of use. Identify the potential therapeutic role of essential oils in skincare.

cb457c5a-9ad6-4290-a6ad-f43e3b55b55a.description: This is a student-nominated award given to two faculty members who have gone above and beyond in the classroom(s) to motivate, mentor, and engage students as well as promote engagement with their peers.
cb457c5a-9ad6-4290-a6ad-f43e3b55b55a.name: 2022 ACHS.edu Faculty Award: Distinguished Teaching

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Awarded to faculty members that have gone above and beyond in the classroom.

e06a27ce-3924-495e-8149-129e3a2061f0.description: This award is self-, peer- and/or administration-nominated award honoring a faculty member who has excelled in service to ACHS including, but not limited to: instructing and supporting students, conducting webinars, participating in curriculum development, excelling at the use of technology in classrooms, and participating in other academic activities that support the institution and its students and graduates.
e06a27ce-3924-495e-8149-129e3a2061f0.name: 2022 ACHS.edu Faculty Award: Distinguished Faculty

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: This is a faculty member who has excelled in service to ACHS students.

073539f8-f7b8-4488-84e6-a1687eac5686.description: The Rising Star Award is an administration-nominated award to honor an instructor in their first year of teaching with ACHS who has demonstrated a commitment to excellence in supporting ACHS students.
073539f8-f7b8-4488-84e6-a1687eac5686.name: 2022 ACHS.edu Faculty Award: Rising Star

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: An instructor in their first year of teaching with ACHS who must demonstrate a commitment to excellence in supporting ACHS students.

5edd78fb-40f7-414d-ab7f-42ece793910e.description: This is a peer-nominated award given to a peer tutor who has gone above and beyond to support, motivate, mentor, and engage students with their coursework. The Distinguished Peer Tutor has helped students bridge toward success, create a sense of belonging, and provide support with grace and compassion.
5edd78fb-40f7-414d-ab7f-42ece793910e.name: Distinguished Peer Tutor

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Tutoring demonstrates leadership by assisting others to set goals and motivating them to develop their skills and alter behaviors to reach those goals. Tutors also may be called upon to advocate for their students and provide helpful feedback to academic staff.

861173a4-350d-479f-8e7f-666cdfcfa827.description: Functional blood chemistry analysis represents one of the most insightful ways to learn about an individual’s health status. In this course, earners develop tools to pinpoint major areas of health dysfunction and direct further testing more strategically. Functional blood chemistry analysis allows practitioners to support optimal health before disease develops.
861173a4-350d-479f-8e7f-666cdfcfa827.name: Functional Nutrition: Blood Chemistry Analysis

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

alignments.name: National Association of Nutrition Professionals
alignments.description: This course provides continuing education for Associate, Professional, and CDSP™ members of the National Association of Nutrition Professionals (NANP).

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this credential have developed an intermediate working knowledge of blood chemistry analysis and an understanding of optimal compared to normal range references in blood analysis. In this micro-credential, each module takes approximately one hour to complete and includes a video lecture, PDF slides, resources, and online assessment.

577fc3fd-2a40-4c54-a588-8feb621b5363.description: Discover the science behind aromatherapy and uncover how essential oils work in the body to create physiological and psychological effects. Study strategies for creating effective essential oils blends that meet your desired goals for aroma and therapeutic use. Each of the four classes in this program has modules focused on essential materia medica, aromatherapy theory, fundamental anatomy and physiology for the aromatherapist, and practical application methods.
577fc3fd-2a40-4c54-a588-8feb621b5363.name: NAHA Level 1 Certified Aromatherapist Training Program

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

alignments.name: National Association for Holistic Aromatherapy Level I

badge_template_activities.title: Earners will feel confident in understanding how to create topical and inhalation aromatherapy applications while following important safety precautions. The four-course series culminates with five interactive hypothetical client case studies focused on common reasons your clients, family, or community are interested in using aromatherapy support plans.

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Raven Eye: Consultative Sales Training

7bed0583-ac8d-4cb4-b47c-ffcf7cde90e6.description: After completion of this course, you will understand the role of the peer tutor, navigating basics, how to develop writing skills, how to find sources and unpack research, and learn about the different ACHS student resources.
7bed0583-ac8d-4cb4-b47c-ffcf7cde90e6.name: Rising Star Peer Tutor

issuer.summary: issued by American College of Healthcare Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Tutoring demonstrates leadership by assisting others to set goals and motivating them to develop their skills and alter behaviors to reach those goals. Tutors also may be called upon to advocate for their students and provide helpful feedback to academic staff.
